general.name: SNAP Defense Deployment
general.description:
v2.0 this script will install SNAP Defense you have two options: 1) Enter a URL and download directly. Variables to set: SNAP_AllowSites = 0, SNAP_DOWNLOAD = URL from portal.
2) Enter Datto Site Variables into the correct location. Variables to set: SNAP_AllowSites = 1 SNAP_DOWLOAD = Nothing needed, all variables set in the sites directly.

variable.name: SNAP_AllowSites
variable.description: If this is set to 1 it will pull variables from the SITE Variables defined under each site.

variable.name: SNAP_DOWNLOAD
variable.description: This downloads directly from URL provided to you by customer support. If you rather use SITE variables for organizational purposes change SNAP_SITES variable to 1 when importing this script.
